Comments_List: I was able to pick up a.lot of knowledge about overarching theories of how congresses, parliaments and assemblies work, as well as greater substantive knowledge of certain regions. The course gave a great chance to develop ideas for further work through the main assignment chain.

I might look to substitute some of the book-length pieces for articles on similar topics by the same authors to allow for more perspectives in any one week. A few more times of the theory being applied to specific legislatures, which does happen in some weeks, would be an incremental improvement too.
